name: 360Cope
tagline: 360Cope project created for Kiran-XRay based in Mumbai. This project was meant to be deployed in Germany for multiple hoospitals to manage their Apron Inventory in the pilot stage. The modules are designed to support a number of government requirements.
body: # Download the project to explore the features
